h2_title: Second Sister Boss Fight and Guide
content: With Zhu Bajie backing you up (and you can always fall back to let him heal you), The Second Sister won't be able to stand against the two of you for long. After she's been defeated, she'll make a mad dash to flee, but not before flinging something at Zhu Bajie, who shrugs it off, and then runs ahead to chase her down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Second_Sister.md', within the main section titled 'The Second Sister', specifically from the subsection 'Second Sister Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
With Zhu Bajie backing you up (and you can always fall back to let him heal you), The Second Sister won't be able to stand against the two of you for long. After she's been defeated, she'll make a mad dash to flee, but not before flinging something at Zhu Bajie, who shrugs it off, and then runs ahead to chase her down.
